lead_paragraph: Bubba Watson clinched the Northern Trust Open on Sunday for a second time in three years, sealing victory by one shot after a wildly fluctuating final round at sunny Riviera.

headline.print_headline: Watson Triumphs by One Shot at Riviera
headline.main: Watson Triumphs by One Shot at Riviera

snippet: Bubba Watson clinched the Northern Trust Open on Sunday for a second time in three years, sealing victory by one shot after a wildly fluctuating final round at sunny Riviera....
